main.name: Niya Bedri
main.bio: Hi there! I have been very passionate about computers and programming since my university life. I dream to be an expert software engineer so that I can build professional and useful software that has business value. I am looking for a senior software developer position that can help me to achieve my goal.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to to build any software for your business.!

quotes1.title: I Would Love to make your Ideas real
quotes1.description: I love graphic design and photography and have been working on my portfolio since 2016. You can download my resume in order to learn the details of my professional life as a designer and photographer. Contact me and we will discuss your projects!

quotes2.title: I can give your business a new creative start right away! Hire me for your Awesome project

education.school: HiLCoE, School of Computer Science and Technology

work.title: Fullstack Developer
work.description: Worked on EMR (Electronic medical record) system. Worked from requirement analysis through development to testing.

work.title: Fullstack Developer
work.description: Worked as a backend developer for a mobile application that was built using flutter. The application is a fundraising platform that supports Ethiopia's currency.

resume.skillssectiontitle: Motivated by the Desire to achieve Success
resume.skillssectiondescription: Here are the stacks that I have been working:
